title: Tirupati: Man forced to carry body of dead son on bike, video goes viral - Times of India
content:
1. Tirupati: Man forced to carry body of dead son on bike, video goes viral  Times of India
  2. Andhra man forced to carry dead son on bike after ambulances overcharge  The News Minute
  3. Andhra Pradesh: Man carries son’s body on motorcycle after ambulance drivers demand hefty charges, six arrested  The Indian Express
  4. On a bike ride from Tirupati, man carries son's body for 90km  Times of India
  5. Father forced to take body of his son on motorcycle, when ambulance operators refused  The New Indian Express
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The video of a man carrying his son’s dead body on a bike has gone viral on social media. The incident happened at a private hospital in Tirupati. The man is not financially well-off and he had to carry the dead body of his son after the private ambulances quoted sky-high fares to transport the body. In fact, reports say the private operators also did not allow a free service ambulance to take the body of the dead boy. After the video went viral, a probe has been launched.
